org.fridlund.backman.managers

Class SnackManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.backman.managers.Manager
      • org.fridlund.backman.managers.SnackManager

  • public class SnackManager
extends Manager
    Controls what the different edible entities do, and for how long their special effect is working.
